mapper.insert: insert into dang_reply(reply_no, board_no, member_no, member_nick, reply_content, reply_writedate, reply_updatedate, reply_state) values(#{replyNo}, #{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{memberNick} , #{replyContent}, sysdate, sysdate, 'N')
mapper.select: select*from( select TMP.*, rownum rn from( select reply.*, board.member_nick as board_member_nick, m.member_owner, m.user_no, uimg.attachment_no from dang_reply reply left outer join dang_board board on reply.board_no=board.board_no left outer join dang_member m on reply.member_no=m.member_no left outer join user_img uimg on m.user_no=uimg.user_no where reply.board_no=#{boardNo} order by reply.reply_no desc )TMP ) where rn between 1 and 5

select*from( select TMP.*, rownum rn from( select reply.*, board.member_nick as board_member_nick, m.member_owner, m.user_no, uimg.attachment_no from dang_reply reply left outer join dang_board board on reply.board_no=board.board_no left outer join dang_member m on reply.member_no=m.member_no left outer join user_img uimg on m.user_no=uimg.user_no where reply.board_no=#{boardNo} and reply.reply_no<#{replyNo} order by reply.reply_no desc )TMP ) where rn between 1 and 5
select count(*) from dang_reply where member_no=#{memberNo}

select reply.*, board.member_nick as board_member_nick, m.member_owner, m.user_no, uimg.attachment_no from dang_reply reply left outer join dang_board board on reply.board_no=board.board_no left outer join dang_member m on reply.member_no=m.member_no left outer join user_img uimg on m.user_no=uimg.user_no where reply_no=#{replyNo}
select reply_no from dang_reply where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.update: update dang_reply set reply_content=#{replyContent}, reply_updatedate=sysdate where reply_no=#{replyNo}
